## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> handling is mostly uniform between the four places that make these decisions: function formal arguments, call instruction args, call instruction returns and function returns.

However, once a decision has been made on where an argument should go, exactly what happens can vary slightly. This class abstracts the differences.

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/valueassigner">ValueAssigner</a> should not depend on any specific function state, and only determine the types and locations for arguments.

Definition at line 175 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### assignArg() {#ab1caf846fc79aa5976216a32724c9e10}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual bool llvm::CallLowering::ValueAssigner::assignArg (unsigned ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> OrigVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> LocVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> LocInfo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> &amp; Info, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp; State)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Wrap call to (typically tablegenerated <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa555cd3eb8141809d16bcfc45ccc3715">CCAssignFn</a>).

This may be overridden to track additional state information as arguments are assigned or apply target specific hacks around the legacy infrastructure.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00199">199</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isIncomingArgumentHandler() {#a28e4c26abcb3bdc9eb7417d1a50fa09b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CallLowering::ValueAssigner::isIncomingArgumentHandler () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if the handler is dealing with incoming arguments, i.e.

those that move values from some physical location to vregs.
